phrase.transcription: qōn̄ ne vōwal 'ama' kurkur
phrase.graid: # np:other np.a:predex
phrase.translation: Once upon a tme, there was a devouring-devil.

phrase.transcription: di ga kurkur ēn 'erē 'an̄sara di ga kur ēn 'an̄sara deln̄en Vunu Lava
phrase.graid: # pro.a:A v:pred np.h:P # pro.a:A v:pred np:.h:P
phrase.translation: He ate all the people, he ate the people all around Vanua Lava.

phrase.transcription: dim kur ... dim qē'ēg kur ēn 'a... ēn 'erē 'an̄sara lēn mē'ē lōo dim kur kur kur vavavan
phrase.graid: #nc # pro.h:A v:pred np.h:P adp np:other # pro.h:S v:pred nc nc nc
phrase.translation: He started to eat people where the sun rises, ate and ate until

phrase.transcription: ne din̄ ma lēn 'ōnō 'ul nō lō 'anē n vunu ne vōwal rak suwēn di rekso dim kurkur vavan ba di din̄ rakrak 'ēn suwō lēn... qōn ne vōwal
phrase.graid: # 0.a:S v:pred adp np:g # np:dtg pro.a:dt [# other pro.a:S v:pred] #neg other pro.a:S v:pred nc 0:g # np:other
phrase.translation: he reached the place where the sun goes down, one island further down he, like he was eating there, on and on, but he had not yet reached further down. One day,

phrase.transcription: direk mimi'ir 'i n 'ama' kurkur ne van ma sir dire
phrase.graid: pro.h:S v:pred # np.a:S v:pred adp pro.h:g
phrase.translation: they were already sleeping, and the devouring-devil came for them.

phrase.transcription: van ma di (m)? van ma van sar lēn lōlō vunu 'anē
phrase.graid: # 0.a:S v:pred # pro.a:S v:pred # 0.a:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: Came, he came and went up into that village.

phrase.transcription: kur ēn 'erē 'an̄sara vavavan ne qē' van ... kur ēn tōo kur ēn qō' kur ēn buluk dim kur vavavan m qē'
phrase.graid: # 0.a:A v:pred np.h:P other #nc # 0.a:A v:pred np:P #nc #nc # pro.a:A v:pred 0:P other #nc
phrase.translation: Ate all the people, on and on, finished (them), ate the chickens, ate the pigs, ate the cattle, he ate on and on, then had finished.

phrase.transcription: ne van n ... nē ... nen vunu ne vōwal m ma'ava
phrase.graid: #nc
phrase.translation: Went. One village, it got daylight.

phrase.transcription: dim van lik lēn ... dine mi'ir lēn ge 'ew'i m ma'ava dine van lik lēn ge 'ew vunu 'anē
phrase.graid: #nc # pro.a:S v:pred adp np:other # v:pred # pro.a:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: He also went in ... He slept in the other one, and when it got daylight, he went also to that other village.

phrase.transcription: 'eraga sul 'alēn vunu 'anē direk rorow va'anē
phrase.graid: # np.h:dts pro.h:S v:pred other
phrase.translation: All the people of this village, they were fleeing now.

phrase.transcription: direk row den ēn vonore 'anē
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:obl-pro.h:poss
phrase.translation: They fled from their home.

phrase.transcription: direk van
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: They went.

phrase.transcription: dirēm (1.7) dirēk van (0.6) dirē sok suō qelen̄ den ēn ... nēn 'ama kurkur direk suō lēn ni'i vunuō ne vōwal nē
phrase.graid: #nc #nc # pro.h:S other v:pred adp nc np.a:obl # pro.h:s v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: They went, they were gonna paddle away from the devouring-devil, they paddled to one small island.

phrase.transcription: direk suō su den 'anēn ren̄e ne vōwal di ga wōtōqtōqō
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S nc v:pred adp 0.a:obl other # np.h:dts pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: They paddled, paddled away from that one. One woman, she was preganant.

phrase.transcription: ban ren̄e 'anē dis 'og 'i birin̄ e 'eraga 'anē duru ... duru ... ruwa mēn 'oworuō
phrase.graid: # other np.h:dts pro.h:S v:pred adp np.h:obl # nc pro.h:S np.h:pred
phrase.translation: But this woman, she was staying with ... these people ... the two ... they were brother and sister.

phrase.transcription: 'am̄an ne vōwal ren̄e ne vōwal ban ren̄e 'anē sa dim wōtōqtōqō ele
phrase.graid: np.h:dt np.h:dt
phrase.translation: One man, one woman, but exactly this woman, she had got pregnant.

phrase.transcription: n qō' kurkur 'anēm van ma suwō sir dire direk kalrakak suō suō den ēn vunu 'anē direk suō 'a Rōu
phrase.graid: # np.a:S v:pred adp pro.h:g # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred adp np:obl # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: This devouring-pig came down for them, and they got up to paddle, to padle away from this village. They paddled to Rōu.

phrase.transcription: direk van 'a Rōu
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: They went to Rōu,

phrase.transcription: n ren̄e 'anē ne vrig ma sir diē ne tek so nik me le m̄as no
phrase.graid: # np.h:S v:pred adp pro.h:g # 0.h:S v:pred other #cc:obl pro.2:A v:pred pro.1:P
phrase.translation: and this woman came running to them and asked: 'Can you take me?'

phrase.transcription: so oo no as le m̄as nike sirēn nak susuō ga tik 'eraga nini'ik ga mew
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred # other:pred #neg pro.1:A v:pred pro.2:P # other np:S v:pred # np.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: He said: 'No, i can't take, bacuase the canoe is small and there are many children of mine.'

phrase.transcription: ni... 'aqam ga luwo nik as van m̄as birin̄ kamam sire den nike van birin̄ kamam n nak susuō ne 'ul
phrase.graid: # nc np:S-pro.2:poss v:pred #neg pro.2:S v:pred adp pro.1:obl # other other pro.2:S v:pred adp pro.1:obl # np:S v:pred
phrase.translation: You have a big belly, you can't come with us, because if you come with us the canoe will sink.

phrase.transcription: 'alē dine sagsag 'i dine 'ēn 'eraga 'aklēgik 'ēqēl lik ma
phrase.graid: # nc pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred #cc:obl np.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Alright, then she sat there for now and she saw that some more people were still coming down.

phrase.transcription: dine vesir dire kimi me le m̄as no kimi me magarsine m̄as no kimik le no
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred pro.h:P #cc:obl pro.2:A v:pred pro.1:P # pro.2:A v:pred pro.1:P # pro.2:A v:pred pro.1:P
phrase.translation: She asked them: 'Can you take me? Can you take pitty on me? Will you take me?

phrase.transcription: nok van 'a'ag kimi
phrase.graid: # pro.1:A v:pred pro.2:P
phrase.translation: So I will come with you?'

phrase.transcription: dire so o siren nak susuō ga tik n 'erē ni'imam ga mew
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other other np:S v:pred # np.h:S-pro.1:poss v:pred
phrase.translation: They said: 'No, because the canoe is too small, we have lots of children.

phrase.transcription: kamam as le m̄as nike siren 'aqam ga luwo den ēn nak susuō ne 'ul
phrase.graid: #neg pro.1:A v:pred pro.2:P # other np:S-pro.2:poss v:pred # other np:S v:pred
phrase.translation: We can't take you because your belly is big and so the canoe could sink.'

phrase.transcription: so a ga itok
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other v:pred
phrase.translation: (She) said: 'Ah, alright.'

phrase.transcription: dim van 'a'ag dire sēnēm vavavan 'eraga 'anēk van mak susu qē'
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred pro.h:P other # v:pred # np.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: She went after them like this, on and on, these people came and paddled all (away).

phrase.transcription: direk su qē' rōw
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Then they had all paddled out.

phrase.transcription: lēn qōn̄ dine mi'ir
phrase.graid: # adp np:other pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: At night she went to sleep.

phrase.transcription: ne qōn̄ ma dine mi'ir va'agēn
phrase.graid: # v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred other
phrase.translation: When it got night she went to sleep.

phrase.transcription: dine mi'ir
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: She slept.

phrase.transcription: ne maran kel ma
phrase.graid: # v:pred
phrase.translation: And when it got daylight again,

phrase.transcription: 'erē qō' ... ēn qō' ... ēn 'ama' kurkur ne van siksik dire va'agēn van ma ba dir man rorow den san vovonore
phrase.graid: # nc nc np.a:A v:pred pro.h:P other # 0.a:S v:pred # other pro.h:A v:pred np:P-pro.h:poss
phrase.translation: the devouring devil went to look for them now, came but they had already fled from their homes.

phrase.transcription: 'alēn .... n 'am... 'ama' dine van din̄ man vunu 'anēn ren̄e 'anē man van ... van dim kal ba'a lēn qoro liē
phrase.graid: # nc nc np.a:dta pro.a:A v:pred np:P # np.h:S v:pred nc # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: Alright, when the ghost came to this village, that woman had already gone. She went into a cave.

phrase.transcription: ka... kal ba'a lēn qoro liē dine 'aq'a sa kēnē
phrase.graid: # nc 0.h:S v:pred adp np:g # pro.h:S v:pred other:l
phrase.translation: Entered the cave, she hid right there.

phrase.transcription: dim 'ogo lēn qoro liē ne 'ogo 'ogo 'ogo vavavan
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred acp np:l # 0.h:S v:pred nc nc other
phrase.translation: She stayed in the cave on and on.

phrase.transcription: dine ... dine rōn̄ sier
phrase.graid: # nc pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Then she felt (that it was time to give birth).

phrase.transcription: a qē dine ... dine visis
phrase.graid: # other nc pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Then she gave birth.

phrase.transcription: dim visis ēn ... n m̄ērm̄ēre ne vōruōn varaba
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred nc np.h:P np.h:dtp
phrase.translation: She gave birth to two babies, twins.

phrase.transcription: varaba ne vōruō 'alē d... 'ogo ... 'ogo vavavan
phrase.graid: # np.h:dts other nc nc 0.h:S v:pred other
phrase.translation: Two twins, alright, she stayed like this, on and on.

phrase.transcription: ne qōn̄ dine mul ba'a lēn lōlō qoro liē ne maran dine kalu ne van ne lele gor e gengen lēn 'ēqē
phrase.graid: # v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g # v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred np:P-pro.h:poss adp np:other
phrase.translation: When it got night, she went into the cave (for the night) and when it got daylight she came out again, went and got food for them in the garden.

phrase.transcription: van din̄ mule len gengen dine kel ma lēn qoro liē sir e ruwa nini'igi
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred other:g # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g adp np.h:g-pro.h:poss
phrase.translation: Went over there, got food, then she came back to her two children in the cave.

phrase.transcription: 'alē dine len mēdēr dine burbur gōr san 'erē qoro liē
phrase.graid: # other pro.h:A v:pred np:P # pro.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: Alright, she took rocks and blocked the openings of the cave.

phrase.transcription: dine van qēl ma dine len mēdēr ne vōwal ne bur gōr
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:A v:pred np:P # 0.h:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: She came down took one rock and blocked (it).

phrase.transcription: ne van qēl suwo ne len ge 'ew'i mēdēr ne bur gōr
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # 0.h:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: Went down, took another rock and blocked (it).

phrase.transcription: dim da 'esēnē din̄ san̄wul
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred other nc nc
phrase.translation: She did like this until ten.

phrase.transcription: mēdēr san̄wul dim mom gōr ē(n)(?) qoro liē
phrase.graid: # np:dtobl pro.h:A v:pred np:P 0:obl
phrase.translation: Ten rocks, she blocked the cave.

phrase.transcription: 'alē direm 'ogo 'ogo 'ogo dim 'ēn gōr ēn 'erē nini'igi 'asēnē
phrase.graid: # other pro.h:S v:pred nc nc # pro.h:A v:pred np.h:P-pro.h:poss other
phrase.translation: Alright, thez stayed like this, on and on, she looked after her children like this.

phrase.transcription: van vavavan
phrase.graid: other nc
phrase.translation: On and on ...

phrase.transcription: 'erē nini'igi 'anēm luwo durum lulumgav qē'
phrase.graid: # np.h:S-pro.h:poss v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: her children grew up and when they had become young men

phrase.transcription: duruk tek mē di so ba 'eraga sul 'a kēnē 'a ve ē
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred adp pro.h:g other #cc:obl other np.h:S other:pred
phrase.translation: they said to her: 'But where are all the people from here?'

phrase.transcription: so o 'eraga sul 'a kēgēnē kamam 'og 'i kēnē ban qō' kurkur ... en 'ama' kurkur dim kurkur 'eraga sul deln̄en Vunu Lava 'anei
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other np.h:dts pro.1:S v:pred other:l # other nc np.a:dta pro.h:A v:pred np.h:P other
phrase.translation: (She) said: 'Oh, the people from here, we lived here, but the devouring devil, he ate the people all around Vanua Lava.

phrase.transcription: direm susu kal 'a Ruō
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred adp other:g
phrase.translation: They paddled to Ruo2.

phrase.transcription: ban 'owok ne vōwal nom tek so dine le no kamak van kal dim 'awi no sire so no ga 'oqo
phrase.graid: # other np.h:dta-pro.1:poss [# pro.1:S v:pred other] #cc:obl pro.h:A v:pred pro.1:P # pro.1:S v:pred # pro.h:A v:pred pro.1:P # other other pro.1:S v:pred
phrase.translation: But one of my brothers, I said that he should take me so that we go there, he didn't want me because I was pregnant.'

phrase.transcription: 'alē dim ...
phrase.graid: #nc

phrase.transcription: so oo ga itok
phrase.graid: #nc
phrase.translation: 'Alright.'

phrase.transcription: so ban 'ama' kurkur ne 'og'og kivie so oo di ga van deln̄en Vunu Lava
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other np.a:S v:pred other:l # 0.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other pro.a:S v:pred adp np:obl
phrase.translation: 'But the devouring devil lives where?' 'No, no, he wanders all around Vanua Lava.'

phrase.transcription: so okay ga itok ba nik me 'es m̄as mumadu e vus
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other v:pred # other pro.2:A v:pred np:P-pro.1:poss
phrase.translation: 'Okay, that's alright. But can you cut us bow and arrow?'

phrase.transcription: so 'e'e e 'es ēn murun vus durum 'ogo 'ogo 'ogo duruk vanēk karkar gor'ōl e mes van kal ma 'o'ogo so ba nik me 'es m̄as komadu e nak susuō
phrase.graid: #nc # other 0.h:A v:pred np:P-pro.h:poss # pro.h:S v:pred nc nc # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v;pred np:P-pro.h:poss # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other pro.2:A v:pred np:P-pro.1:poss
phrase.translation: 'Yes.' Cut them bow and arrow. The two stayed like this on and on, the two went and shot fish for the three of them, came upwards, stayed like this: 'But can you cut us a canoe?'

phrase.transcription: so 'e'e ga itok no me 'es m̄as komru e nak susuō
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #cc:obl other v:pred # pro.1:A v:pred np:P-pro.2:poss
phrase.translation: 'Yes, that's all right. I can cut a canoe for you.'

phrase.transcription: 'alē ne 'es ēn korun nak susuō
phrase.graid: # other 0.h:A v:pred np:P-pro.h:poss
phrase.translation: Alright, then she cut a canoe for them.

phrase.transcription: qōn̄ ne vōwal dine tek mē duru so
phrase.graid: #nc
phrase.translation: One day, she said to them:

phrase.transcription: duruk tek mē di so kamaduk vanēk gogo
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred adp pro.h:g other #ds pro.1:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: They said to her: 'We're going hooking.'

phrase.transcription: so okay ga itok
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other v:pred
phrase.translation: 'Alright.'

phrase.transcription: ?? kumru wom van
phrase.graid: #ds other pro.2:S other v:pred
phrase.translation: When you go

phrase.transcription: kumru me rōn̄rōn̄ gōr kel no ma sire den ēn 'ama' kurkur ne van ma sir no
phrase.graid: #ds pro.2:A v:pred pro.1:P # other other np.a:S v:pred adp pro.1:other
phrase.translation: you will have an ear on me back here because the devouring devil could come for me.'

phrase.transcription: so ga itok
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds v:pred
phrase.translation: 'Alright.'

phrase.transcription: 'alēn son e ruwa m̄ērm̄̄erē 'anē ge'ew'in sogi e Mulēmulēo ge'ew'in sogi Mulēmulēmarinō
phrase.graid: # other other np.h:dt np.h:dt np:S-pro.h:poss np:pred # np.h:dt np:S-pro.h:poss np:pred
phrase.translation: Alright, the names of these two children, the one, his name is Mule2mule2o, the other, his name is Mule2mule2marino2.

phrase.transcription: 'alē duruk kalraka ne ... direm 'o'ogo ne revrev duruk van va'agēn van lēn gogo
phrase.graid: #nc # pro.h:S v:pred # v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred other # 0.h:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: Alright, the two got up ... They stayed like this, and when it got evening, the two went. Went hooking.

phrase.transcription: durum len korun nak... len vus len korun nak susuōn 'erē wo'iqē duruk van
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred nc nc nc np:P # 0.h:A v:pred np:P-pro.h:poss np:other # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: The two took their ... took bows, took their canoe, the arrows, then the two went.

phrase.transcription: van rōw 'alo rēv sur ēn nak susuō duruk van
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred other:g # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Went down to the sea, dragged down the canoe, then the two went.

phrase.transcription: durum van rōw salsal 'i lēn lama
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred adp np:l
phrase.translation: The two went out, floated in the open sea.

phrase.transcription: salsal 'i lēn lama rōn̄ sar lēn n̄ērē'iē
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred adp np:l # 0.h:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: While floating in the open sea, (they) listened landwards to the shore.

phrase.transcription: duruk gogo e rōn̄ wuvan lasbon
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # other 0.h:s v:pred # np.h:S
phrase.translation: Then they hooked, just heard, the lastborn

phrase.transcription: ne te2k so hei Marino rōn̄ sare2 lēn ... rōn̄ sarē n
phrase.graid: v:pred other #ds other other #nc #ds vother:pred other:g
phrase.translation: said: 'Hey, Marino, listen landwards.

phrase.transcription: nok rōn̄ 'i son qorotot e ote ne sursur ēn nes
phrase.graid: #ds pro.1:S v:pred #cc:obl np:pred #ds np.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: I hear noise, mum is singing a song.

phrase.transcription: wunva
phrase.graid: #nc
phrase.translation: maybe ...'

phrase.transcription: e 'm ... mm Mulē... Mulēo so 'oo n
phrase.graid: #nc

phrase.transcription: n... e Mulē... Marino ne tek mē di so oon ner n ner ne ... n lan̄ ne vever ēn ner n ner ne dan qorotot
phrase.graid: #nc # np.h:S v:pred adp pro.h:g other #ds other np:pred # np:dtp nc np:A v:pred np:P # np:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: Then Marino said to him: 'No, it's the seaoaks. The wind is shaking the seaoaks, and the seaoaks are making a noise.'

phrase.transcription: so 'o gēduk sal duk rōn̄da
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other pro.1:S v:pred # pro.1:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: 'No, while we are floating (here), we should listen to it.'

phrase.transcription: so 'o gogo den gogo den
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other vother:pred #nc
phrase.translation: 'No, let's just hook, let's just hook.'

phrase.transcription: duruk salsal 'ik rōn̄
phrase.graid: # pro.1:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Then the two were floating there and listening.

phrase.transcription: 'o sursur ēn nes
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other 0.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: No, is singing a song.

phrase.transcription: 'alē Mari... Mulē... Mulēmulēo ne tek mēn e Mulēmarino so
phrase.graid: #nc # np.h:S v:pred adp np.h:g other
phrase.translation: Mule2mul2o said to Mule2marino:

phrase.transcription: Marino rōn̄ 'i nēn nes e ote sas sursur ēn nes 'anē so 'o n ner ēn ner
phrase.graid: #ds other vother:pred #ds np:pred #ds np.h:A v:pred np:P # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other np:pred #nc
phrase.translation: 'Marino, listen, a song, it's mum who is singing this song.' 'Oh, (it's) the seaoaks, the seaoaks.

phrase.transcription: en masōgin lan̄ ne ver ēn ner n ner ne dan qorotot
phrase.graid: #ds np:other np:A v:pred np:P #ds np:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: When the wind is shaking the seaoaks, the seaoaks make noise.'

phrase.transcription: 'a logi so duru so o e Mulēo so qe'i gēduk sal rōn̄ gēduk rōn̄da
phrase.graid: #nc # np.h:S other:pred #ds other pro.1:S v:pred # pro.1:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: Mule2o said: 'Wait, let's float quietly and listen carefully.'

phrase.transcription: e duruk sal rōrōn̄ duruk sal rōrōn̄ 'anē
phrase.graid: # other pro.h:S v:pred #nc
phrase.translation: So then the two floated quietly, and when the two floated quietly,

phrase.transcription: rōn̄ sarē ote muru ne surusur ēn nes va'anē
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred other:g # np.h:A v:pred np:P other
phrase.translation: listened landwards, their mum was singing a song now.

phrase.transcription: sur ēn nes lēn nes 'a bēne dim van esēgēn
phrase.graid: # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # adp np:dt pro:S v:pred other
phrase.translation: Sang a song, the song to it goes like this:

phrase.transcription: 'alē dine le den ēn n mēdēr ne vowal kal lu ma sagē ne 'ēqēl suwō
phrase.graid: # other pro.h:A v:pred np:P # 0.h:S v:pred other:g # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Then she removed one rock, came out and went down.

phrase.transcription: e ne kalraka durus salsal 'i durus rōn̄ ē sur lik ēn nes
phrase.graid: # other 0.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred #cc:obl 0.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: Then got up, the two floating there they heard, sang the song again:

phrase.transcription: duruk susuō sar susuō sar susuō sar
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred #nc #nc
phrase.translation: Then the two paddled landwards, paddled landwards, paddled landwards.

phrase.transcription: so 'ekē n 'ama' 'ama' kurkur qiri ne kur ēn vēvēduō
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other nc np.a:A other v:pred np.h:P-pro.1:poss
phrase.translation: 'Oh dear, the devouring devil today, he will eat our mother.'

phrase.transcription: duruk susuō
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: The two padd.led

phrase.transcription: o wē n vēvēru ne sursur ēn nes
phrase.graid: # nc nc np.h:A-pro.h:poss v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: Their mother was singing the song,

phrase.transcription: 'ama' ne lele den ēn ... n mēdēr den ēn mē'ēm̄ē 'a lēn qoro liē
phrase.graid: # np.h:A v:pred nc np:P adp np:obl
phrase.translation: and the devil was removing the rocks from the door of the cave.

phrase.transcription: durum susuō susuō susuō vavan duruk suō kal sar rōn̄
phrase.translation: The two paddled and paddled, they paddled towards the shore, heard:

phrase.transcription: durum sususuō suō din̄ sar ēn n̄ere'ie
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: The two were paddling, paddled ashore,

phrase.transcription: rēv kal sar ēn nak susuō
phrase.graid: # 0.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: dragged the canoe ashore,

phrase.transcription: duruk van gis ēn vus birin̄ ēn 'erē wō'iqe duruk van
phrase.graid: #nc # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: then the two went, holding the bows and the arrows, then the two went.

phrase.transcription: van van vavavan sar
phrase.graid: #nc # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Went, on and on, went bushwards,

phrase.transcription: duruk din̄ sar
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: and when they arrived up there,

phrase.transcription: n ... n mēdēr ne vōruō va'i wo 'ama' ne sēs din̄ suw e ote muruō
phrase.graid: # nc np:S other:pred # other np.a:A v:pred np.h:P-pro.h:poss
phrase.translation: two rocks were left, and the devil rooted through (them) reaching their mother.

phrase.transcription: e duruk din̄ sar ote muru so
phrase.graid: # other pro.h:S v:pred # np.h:S=pro.h:poss other:pred
phrase.translation: Then they arrived up there, and their mother:

phrase.transcription: duruk din̄ sar duruk din̄ wal sar ēn qoro liē 'anē n 'ama' ne le kal ge'ew'i mēdēr lik mēdēr ne vōwal lik
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:A v:pred np:P # np.a:A v:pred np:P np:other
phrase.translation: The two arrived up there, reached the opening of the cave, then the devil lifted another rock, one more rock.

phrase.transcription: duruk kalraka duruk tek mē di so ei nike van 'akēnē so nike da sivie
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred adp pro.h:g other #ds other pro.2:S v:pred other:g #ds pro.2:S v:pred
phrase.translation: They got up and said: 'Ei, you came here, what are you up to?'

phrase.transcription: so o gitag so kamadu me vus ma' wal nike sa ēnē
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other other:pred # 0.h:S other:pred #ds pro.1:A v:pred pro.2:P
phrase.translation: 'Oh, nothing.' 'We will kill you right now.'

phrase.transcription: so o magarsine 'erē ... 'erē buls.. 'erē bulsal kumru 'ovi'i da magarsin no
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other other:pred #nc #ds np.2:dt pro.2:A v:pred pro.1:P
phrase.translation: 'Oh, sorry, friends, you mustn't harm me.'

phrase.transcription: so nike 'anē sa nikem kur qē' 'eraga sul 'alēn ... 'a lē Vunu Lava 'anē qiri 'anei kamadu me vus wal ēn es nōm sa qiri 'anei
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds pro.2:dt pro.2:A v:pred np.h:P #ds other pro.1:A v:pred np:P-pro.2:poss other
phrase.translation: 'It was you who killed the people of Vanua Lava. Today, we will extinguish your life today.'

phrase.transcription: dine rara mē duruō duruk kar die vōwal ne kar 'ōn vus
phrase.graid: # pro.a:S v:pred adp pro.h:g # pro.h:A v:pred pro.a:P # np.h:S v:pred adp np:other
phrase.translation: Then he cried to them, and they shot at him, one shot with (his) bow and arrow,

phrase.transcription: dine aw vōwal ne kar
phrase.graid: # pro.a:S v:pred # np.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: and he cried out, one shot

phrase.transcription: dine aw rōw sir e ge'ew'i ge'ew'i ne kar
phrase.graid: # pro.a:S v:pred # 0.a:S v:pred adp np.h:g # np.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: he cried out, ran towards the oter one, and the other one shot.

phrase.transcription: duruk kar die kar die vavavan
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred pro.a:P #nc
phrase.translation: They shot at him, shot at him, on and on,

phrase.transcription: dine ma'
phrase.graid: # pro.a:S v:pred
phrase.translation: and then he was dead.

phrase.transcription: dim ma' duruk le die 'ev'ē den ēn mē'ēm̄ē 'alēn ge 'anē
phrase.graid: # pro.a:S v:pred # pro.h:A v:pred pro.a:P # 0.h:A v:pred 0:P adp np:other
phrase.translation: When he was dead, they took him, threw him off the door of that thing.

phrase.transcription: dir'ōl .. dir ga kal duruk kal suwō sir e ote muruō dir'ōl 'og 'i 'anē
phrase.graid: #nc # pro.h:S v:pred adp np.h:g-pro.h:poss # pro.h:S v:pred other
phrase.translation: Then they went inside to their mother, and the three of them stayed there for now.

phrase.transcription: so ban 'amam van lu vie so kadu man vus
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other np.a:S v:pred other:g # 0.h:S other:pred #ds pro.1:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: 'But where did the devil go?' 'We've killed him.'

phrase.transcription: so 'aw kumru ga magarsine kumru ga tiktik soksok kumru as vus m̄as so oo kamadu man vus ēn 'ama' kadum kar ma' ēn 'ama' sag ma nē
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other pro.2:S v:pred #ds pro.2:S v:pred #ds pro.2:A v:pred 0:P # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other pro.1:A v:pred np.a:P #ds pro.1:A v:pred np.a:P other
phrase.translation: 'Oh dear, you are pitiful, as you are too small so you can't kill (him).' 'Oh no, we have already kiled the devil, we shot the devil to death up here.'

phrase.transcription: ga itok
phrase.graid: #nc
phrase.translation: 'Alright.

phrase.transcription: kal ma gēdōl mi'ir
phrase.graid: #ds vother:pred #ds pro.1:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Come inside, let's sleep.

phrase.transcription: dirōl van qēl suwē dirōlm mi'ir mi'ir vavan din̄ ēn ma'ava
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred #nc
phrase.translation: They went down and slept, on and on, until the morning.

phrase.transcription: ne ma'av ma
phrase.graid: # v:pred
phrase.translation: When it got morning

phrase.transcription: dirōl ... e ote muruō ne tek mē duruō so
phrase.graid: # nc np.h:S v:pred adp pro.h:g other
phrase.translation: their mum said to them:

phrase.transcription: gēdōl sin̄ ēn 'ama'
phrase.graid: #ds pro.1:A v:pred np.a:P
phrase.translation: 'Let's burn the devil / the corpse.'

phrase.transcription: okay ga itok
phrase.graid: #nc
phrase.translation: 'Ok, (that)'s alright.'

phrase.transcription: dirōl kalraka van sar 'ev kirm̄ōn qi'i 'ama'
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: They got up, went bushwards, smashed the corpse's head to pieces,

phrase.transcription: mom kal sag lēn wōwō nev
phrase.graid: # 0.h:A v:pred 0:P adp np:g
phrase.translation: put it ontop of a fire,

phrase.transcription: 'alē sin ̄ēn 'irbē 'ama' sin̄sin̄ qē' so gēdōl dan gengen
phrase.graid: # other 0.h:A v:pred np:P # 0.h:A v:pred 0:P # 0.h:S other:pred #ds pro.1:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: alright, burned the dead body. When they had burnt (it) (their mother) said: 'Let's make some food.'

phrase.transcription: taem ... lēn masōgi direk sin̄sin̄ ēn 'ama' 'eraga lēn ... 'eraga 'a rōw m 'ēn kal man nos
phrase.graid: # nc adp np:other pro.h:A v:pred np.a:P # nc nc np.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: When they burnt the corpse, the ones at Ro2w looked hither and saw smoke,

phrase.transcription: 'aval Vunu Lava 'a gēn
phrase.graid: # np:dt
phrase.translation: on the other side of Vanua Lava from here.

phrase.transcription: direk 'ēn kal man nos direk 'ēn nos bibis ēn nos bibis ēn nos so 'ei
phrase.graid: pro.h:A v:pred np:P #nc # 0.h:A v:pred np:P #nc # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other
phrase.translation: They looked hither and saw smoke, they saw the smoke, got the smoke, said: 'Hey

phrase.transcription: n sava ne vōwal sar gēn
phrase.graid: np:S other:pred
phrase.translation: there is something up there (on the shore).'

phrase.transcription: direk kalrak direk su kal ma
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: Then they got up and came paddling.

phrase.transcription: su kal ma ba e ... e ruwa m̄ērm̄ērem van lēn 'ēqē' le gengen direk dan gengen sir san 'ama durum vus ē
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred # other nc np.h:s v:pred adp np:g # 0.h:S v:pred # pro.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: Came paddling landwards, the two children went to the garden to get food, so that they could make a meal because of that devil they had killed.

phrase.transcription: le gengen lēn 'ēqē' ote murum 'og 'i lēn vunum vus ēn tōo vus ēn qō'
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred adp np:other # np.h:S-pro.h:poss v:pred adp np:l # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # 0.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: Got food in the garden, their mother stayed behind in the village, killed a chicken, killed a pig,

phrase.transcription: dine da sir ēn bigbig gor'ōl e ruwa ne ... e ruwa m̄ērm̄ērek vanek le gor'ō... gor'ōln gengen
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:obl-pro.h:poss #nc # np.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred-pro.h:poss np:P
phrase.translation: she looked after the 'meat' for the three of them and the two children went and got food for the three of them.

phrase.transcription: dir'ōl 'ēqēl 'ō' kel ma
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: The three came down again bringing (it),

phrase.transcription: wana dir'ōl so sag sōk gengen
phrase.graid: # other pro.h:S other v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: sat down and started to eat

phrase.transcription: maranaga ne su kal ma maranaga ne su ma so oo
phrase.graid: # np.h:S v:pred #nc # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other
phrase.translation: when the chief pulled ashore, the chief pulled hither and said: 'Oh

phrase.transcription: ei m van kal ma rēv kal man nak susuō ne van sar vavavan sar
phrase.graid: # other 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # 0.h:S v:pred #nc
phrase.translation: hey!' came up the shore, dragged the canoe ashore and went bushwards, on and on bushwards,

phrase.transcription: e so n nos 'anēm da sivie so oo n ... e ruwa m̄ērm̄ēre muk vus ēn 'ama'
phrase.graid: # other 0.h:S other:pred #ds np:S v:pred # 0.h:S other:pred #ds other nc np.h:A-pro.1:poss v:pred np.a:P
phrase.translation: then said: 'This smoke, what's up?' 'No no, my two children killed the devil.

phrase.transcription: ba 'erē su kal kel ma n 'ama' mal ma'
phrase.graid: #ds other other.2:dt vother:pred #ds np.a:S v:pred
phrase.translation: But, everybody, come up here, the devil is already dead long ago.

phrase.transcription: e ruwa m̄ērm̄ēre man vus
phrase.graid: #ds np.h:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: The two children have killed him.'

phrase.transcription: so oo duru as vus m̄as so 'an̄ kal sag ma nē lēn qōtō
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds.neg other pro.h:A v:pred 0:P # other 0.h:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: 'Oh, the two cannot have killed (him).' Then reached out for the qo2to2 basket -

phrase.transcription: qōtō din ge 'alēn mom n̄ar
phrase.graid: # np:dt pro:S np:pred
phrase.translation: qo2to2, it's something to put almonds into

phrase.transcription: si 'alēn ga nos 'ama'
phrase.translation: or to put dead bodies into it,

phrase.transcription: nos ēn 'erē 'an̄sara lēn lōlōgi
phrase.graid: #nc
phrase.translation: to put a couple people into it,

phrase.transcription: n sogin qōtō
phrase.graid: # np:S np:pred
phrase.translation: its name is 'qo2to2'.

phrase.transcription: 'alē qē' direk ... dine 'an̄ kal sag lēn qōtō dine le qēl man qi'i 'ama' dine 'ēn
phrase.graid: # other other nc pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g # pro.h:A v:pred np:P # pro.h:A v:pred 0:P
phrase.translation: Alright, then he reached up into the qo2to2 basket and took down the devil's head and he had a look (at it).

phrase.transcription: dim 'ēn'ēn qē' dine susur kel 'anē ne van
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred 0:P # pro.h:S v:pred other # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: When he had had a look (at it), he paddled (off) again, went.

phrase.transcription: ne van ne 'aram mēn 'eraga sul 'a Ruō
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred 0:P adp np.h:g
phrase.translation: Went, told the people at Ruo2,

phrase.transcription: direk su kal ma dir'ōlk 'og 'ik gengen
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: then they came paddling, and the three stayed behind and ate.

phrase.transcription: gengen vavan qē' ote muru ne tek mē duruō so
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred other # other np.h:S=pro.h:poss v:pred adp pro.h:g other
phrase.translation: Ate and ate, then their (DL) mum said to them:

phrase.transcription: kumru me 'ēn ēn marumruō
phrase.graid: #ds pro.2:A v:pred np.h:P-pro.2:poss
phrase.translation: '(When) you will see your (DL) uncle

phrase.transcription: nome ... nome ... no me 'aram mē kumrun marumruō dim su kal ma nom ... kēm? 'ēn eraga susuō kumrum rōn̄ nom tek so
phrase.graid: # nc nc pro.1:A v:pred adp pro.h:g np.h:P-pro.2:poss #ds pro.h:S v:pred #nc #ds pro.2:S v:pred #cc:obl pro.1:S v:pred other
phrase.translation: I will point out your (DL) uncle to you, when he has paddled ashore here, ?? see the people paddling, if you hear (that) I say:

phrase.transcription: n mamrumruō gēn
phrase.graid: #ds np.h:S-pro.2:poss other:pred
phrase.translation: 'Your uncle (is) here.'

phrase.transcription: e wo kumruk vus die
phrase.graid: #ds other other pro.2:A v:pred pro.h:P
phrase.translation: then you kill him.'

phrase.transcription: ba dim da ... durum da 'a'ag wal sa sēnē
phrase.graid: #nc # pro.h:S v:pred other
phrase.translation: And the two did (it) exactly like this, following (her advice).

phrase.transcription: maranagam out kel den sarē dim van
phrase.graid: # np.h:S v:pred adp other:obl # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: The chief had left again from uphill, had gone,

phrase.transcription: din̄ rōwē 'a Ruō 'aram mēn 'eraga sul
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred other:g adp np:g # 0.h:S v:pred 0:P adp np.h:g
phrase.translation: reach(ed) Ruo2 out (in the ocean), told the people,

phrase.transcription: direm su kal kel ma
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: they paddled hither again.

phrase.transcription: su kal kel ma van ma van ma vavavan direk su kal ma dir'ōlm van rōw lēn mē'ērsa dir'ōlm sagsag 'ēn'ēn gōr ēn erē nak susuō
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S v:pred # 0.h:S v:pred #nc # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g # pro.h:S v:pred # 0.h:A v:pred np:P
phrase.translation: Paddled up hither again, came, came, on and on,then they came ashore. The three had gone down to the harbour and were sitting there, observing the canoes.

phrase.transcription: 'erē nak susuōm van van van van vavavan
phrase.graid: # np:S v:pred other #nc
phrase.translation: The canoes, went on and on.

phrase.transcription: ote muru son marumruō sa nē s lele 'i 'anē
phrase.graid: # np.h:S other:pred #ds np.h:S-pro.2:poss np:pred [#rc 0.h:S v:pred other]
phrase.translation: Their (DL) mum said: 'Your uncle is this (one), (the one [taking (it) ???]).'

phrase.transcription: durum le man vusuruō mom lēn ... mom rōvrōv'e duruō
phrase.graid: # pro.h:A v:pred np:P-pro.h:poss #nc # 0.h:A v:pred 0:P adp pro.h:g
phrase.translation: The two took their bow and arrows, put (them) close to them (DL).

phrase.transcription: duruk watchem dim van kal ma van kal ma van kal ma
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred #cc:obl pro.h:S v:pred #nc
phrase.translation: Then they (DL) watched him coming up the shore, coming up the shore,

phrase.transcription: vavavan kal ma dim siōl kal sar lēn nōn
phrase.graid: # nc 0.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred adp np:g
phrase.translation: coming and coming up the shore, he pulled ashore onto the beach,

phrase.transcription: ne gis ēn nak susuō e ruwa m̄ērm̄ērek din̄ di rōw
phrase.graid: # 0.h:A v:pred np:P # np.h:A v:pred pro.h:P
phrase.translation: then took the canoe, and the two children reached him down (at the sea):

phrase.transcription: nik 'agēnēsa nikem da ōsōs e ote mumaduō lēn masōgi di ga wotoqtoqo
phrase.graid: # pro.2:dt pro.2:A v:pred np.h:P-pro.1:poss # adp np:other pro.h:S v:pred
phrase.translation: 'Wasn't it you who ??? our mum at the time that she was pregnant?

phrase.transcription: dim tek so ne van birin̄ nike
phrase.graid: #ds pro.h:S v:pred #cc:obl other 0.h:s v:pred adp pro.2:other
phrase.translation: She said (that she) should go with you,

phrase.transcription: e nike tek so ooo den ēn nak susuō ne 'ul
phrase.graid: #ds other pro.2:S v:pred other #ds other other np:S v:pred
phrase.translation: and then youy said: 'No, the canoe might sink.'

phrase.transcription: kamaduō me vus wal nik sa qiri 'anei
phrase.graid: #ds pro.1:A v:pred pro.2:P other
phrase.translation: We will definitely kill you today.'

phrase.transcription: dine rara dine awaw so 'awo e ruwa vanvann̄ok kumru 'ovi'i da magarsin no
phrase.graid: # pro.h:S v:pred # pro.h:S v:pred other #ds other np.2:dt-pro.1:poss pro.2:A v:pred pro.1:P
phrase.translation: Then he started to cry, to shout: 'Oh no, my two nephews, you mustn't harm me.'

phrase.transcription: man qē' kumru man vus ēn 'ama' ga 'i'irisē
phrase.graid: #ds v:pred #ds pro.2:A v:pred np.a:P nc nc
phrase.translation: That's it, you have already killed the devil, (it)'s enough.

phrase.transcription: 'enei gēdēk van kal wuva gēdēk dan lavet sir e kumrum vus ēn 'ama'
phrase.graid: #ds other pro.1:S v:pred # pro.1:A v:pred np:P #ds other pro.2:A v:pred np.a:P
phrase.translation: Now we will go just (a bit) upwards, we will make a feast because you killed the devil.'

phrase.transcription: so kamadu me vus wal nike sa qiri 'anei
phrase.graid: # 0.h:S other:pred #ds pro.1:A v:pred pro.2:P other
phrase.translation: 'We will definitely kill you today.'

phrase.transcription: n maruruō ne awaw ge'ew'i ne kar ge'ew'i ne kar ge'ew'i ne kar ge'ew'i ne kar vavavan kar mama' di e qē
phrase.graid: # np.h:S-pro.h:poss v:pred # np.h:S v:pred # np.h:S v:pred #nc #nc # 0.h:A v:pred pro.h:P #nc
phrase.translation: Their uncle was shouting, and one shot and the other shot, and the (first) one shot, and the other one shot, and so on, shot him dead, and (this is the) end.
